alert.note: Alert for Creek; Pawnee; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 5:28PM CDT until May 04 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Creek County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... West central Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Shamrock, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Sand Springs... Bristow... Sapulpa... Mannford... Kellyville... Depew... Westport... Shamrock... Keystone State Park... Gray... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 183 and 217. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
